item.tprt.anchor_sword.description: A heavy, exotic weapon that enhances both melee combat and defense
item.tprt.magic_blade.description: A weapon that inflicts Magic damage on attack(need [Enchanting] upgrade)
material.tprt.mixeddragon.flavor: A legendary substance, rarely seen in form
material.tprt.source_alloy.flavor: The perfect fusion of magic and metal
material.tprt.cursium.flavor: A legendary warrior of the past, now a cursed undead
material.tprt.witherite.flavor: A technological marvel from ancient times
material.tprt.evil_beast_alloy.flavor: The silent guardians of the Soul Forge
material.tprt.black_steel.flavor: A unique alloy forged by the ancient craftsmen of the snowy plains
material.tprt.ancient_metal.flavor: An ancient, resilient metal originating from the desert
material.tprt.koboleton_bone.flavor: Bones of an ancient remnant, far stronger than ordinary bone
material.tprt.advanced_manyullyn.flavor: This is the legendary Manyullyn that can sever galaxies!
material.tprt.stymphalian_bird_feather.f: Arrows fitted with these feathers soar like birds of prey
material.tprt.dragonbone.flavor: Even though it's already dead, there is still some power.
material.tprt.frosted_helve.flavor: Pervaded by a chilling cold and the mystery of frost
material.tprt.hogskin.flavor: Hide of a Nether beast, tough and good at conducting magic
material.tprt.arcane_metal.flavor: Specially processed metal, brimming with magical power
material.tprt.dragonskin.flavor: Scales of the End Dragon, filled with the power of the End
modifier.tprt.the_dragon_power.flavor: Obtain the power of the Dragon God
modifier.tprt.the_dragon_power.descripti: Increases damage dealt by 20% per 10 max health. Subsequent increased injuries will become additional multiplication areas when max health exceeds 200
modifier.tprt.the_dragon_lord.descriptio: Gain flying ability when the maximum health is greater than or equal to 100.Get additional damage reduction according to the maximum health.
modifier.tprt.mixeddragon_ranged.flavor: The power of dragons surges unceasingly
modifier.tprt.mixeddragon_ranged.descrip: Greatly increases projectile power and projectile speed
modifier.tprt.be_thoroughly_tempered.fla: The power of forging lies within
modifier.tprt.be_thoroughly_tempered.des: Increases all attributes of the tool
modifier.tprt.be_thoroughly_tempered_cur: The power of forging lies within
Per level: Increases max health by 6% and attack damage by 6%
modifier.tprt.magic_sublimation.flavor: Your magic becomes pure and powerful
modifier.tprt.magic_sublimation.descript: Increases melee damage based on the wielder's spell power
modifier.tprt.magic_sublimation_range.fl: Your magic becomes pure and powerful
modifier.tprt.magic_sublimation_range.de: Increases arrow damage based on spell power
modifier.tprt.source_alloy_charm.descrip: Greatly increases spell power. Actively consumes the wielder's mana
modifier.tprt.source_alloy_armor.flavor: The natural magic flows towards you
modifier.tprt.source_alloy_armor.descrip: Increases spell resistance, max mana, and mana regeneration speed
modifier.tprt.source_alloy_spell_cloth.f: Every word and character is magic
modifier.tprt.burning_flames.description: Attacks apply Searing Brand. Max effect level equals modifier level cap
modifier.tprt.wrath_of_flames.flavor: The wrath of the Nether Flame Lord
modifier.tprt.wrath_of_flames.descriptio: For each stack of Searing Brand on the target, attack deals an additional 10% fire damage
modifier.tprt.cursed_spirit.flavor: The power of a death curse serves you
modifier.tprt.soul_puncture.flavor: Tear the enemy's soul using the death curse
modifier.tprt.soul_dodge.description: Low chance to completely ignore damage taken
modifier.tprt.advanced_greed.description: Each attack increases attack damage by 5%, stacks up to 10 times
modifier.tprt.arrogant.description: When the health is full, the whole body will be given 5% independent damage reduction per level(up to 40%). If the current health is greater than 50% of the maximum health value, the effect will be reduced to 3% (up to 24%) per level.
modifier.tprt.mechanical_star_att.flavor: A marvel of engineering, the embodiment of a war machine
modifier.tprt.mechanical_star_att.descri: Your armor value increases damage dealt
modifier.tprt.mechanical_star_arm.flavor: A marvel of engineering, the embodiment of a war machine
modifier.tprt.mechanical_star_arm.descri: Your armor value provides damage reduction
modifier.tprt.machine_iron_casting.flavo: The defensive properties of this high-density material are unparalleled, but it is also very heavy
modifier.tprt.cinder_slash.flavor: A devastating strike that spews lava
modifier.tprt.cinder_slash.description: Adds a rear splash damage based on a percentage of attack damage. Higher levels increase splash range and multiplier
modifier.tprt.soul_infection.flavor: Long-term immersion has filled it with soul power
modifier.tprt.soul_infection.description: Slightly increases all attributes of the tool
modifier.tprt.soul_surge.flavor: Long-term immersion has filled it with soul power
modifier.tprt.strong_but_pliable.flavor: Unique metal structure grants both strength and flexibility
modifier.tprt.strong_but_pliable.descrip: Base durability +500. Attack damage, armor value, and projectile power gradually increase as durability gets higher
modifier.tprt.ancient_sandstorm.descript: Base durability +1500. Attack damage, armor value, and projectile power gradually gain high percentage increases as durability gets higher
modifier.tprt.ancient_sandstorm.requirem: Requires Ancient Metal material as prerequisite
modifier.tprt.luck_strike.description: Attack damage has a chance to be multiplied. Higher Luck and modifier level increase the multiplier. Damage is reduced when not critical
modifier.tprt.metallization.description: Greatly improves arrow attributes, but accuracy is reduced
modifier.tprt.the_prestige_of_dragon.fla: Contain the power of the dragon!
modifier.tprt.the_prestige_of_dragon.des: Slightly increase all tool stats of the tool
modifier.tprt.wrath_of_the_dragon.descri: Increase projectile damage by 0.6 per level.
modifier.tprt.ice_spell_power_improved.f: The chill of frost gives you deeper understanding of frost spells
modifier.tprt.mana_improved.flavor: Contained magic makes your mana abundant
modifier.tprt.mana_improved.description: Increases max mana, mana regeneration speed, and spell resistance
modifier.tprt.spell_power_improved.flavo: This material is filled with magic
modifier.tprt.spell_power_improved.descr: Increases max mana and spell power
modifier.tprt.ender_spell_power_improved: The echo of the End gives you deeper understanding of Ender spells
modifier.tprt.human_turpentine.descripti: Attack damage increased to 125%. Attacks deal additional dragon breath damage and it can be improved according to spell power and ender spell power
modifier.tprt.marathon.description: Movement speed greatly increased while holding the weapon
modifier.tprt.will_from_ancient.descript: Slightly increases tool attack power and projectile power. Attacks reduce part of the target's armor
modifier.tprt.nature_affinity.descriptio: Per level: Increases max health by 3
modifier.tprt.skeleton_affinity.flavor: Doo doo da doo doo da
modifier.tprt.skeleton_affinity.descript: Per level: Increases attack damage by 2
modifier.tprt.dwarf_power.flavor: Charge into the mines like a dwarf!
modifier.tprt.dwarf_power.description: Grants Haste effect equal to the trait level
modifier.tprt.sky_affinity.description: Gain an extra jump ability every 2 levels. Gravity effect on self is reduced
modifier.tprt.lightweight.description: Per level: Increases movement speed by 15% and jump height by 0.75 blocks
modifier.tprt.lightweight_spell.flavor: Casting is as simple as breathing now
modifier.tprt.lightweight_spell.descript: Increases spell cast time reduction by 20%
modifier.tprt.down_to_the_bone.flavor: Pain that goes deep into the marrow
modifier.tprt.burning_ash.description: Per level: Increases attack damage by 3
modifier.tprt.shielding.description: Per level: Increases armor value and armor toughness by 10%
modifier.tprt.ruthless_and_tyrannical.fl: What are you looking at?! Did I say you could look?!
modifier.tprt.ruthless_and_tyrannical.de: Per level: Increases attack damage by 20% and attack speed by 15%, but armor value reduced by 20%
modifier.tprt.ruthless_and_tyrannical_sp: What are you looking at?! Did I say you could look?!
Universal spell power increased by 25%, but armor value and spell resistance reduced by 25%
modifier.tprt.mana_regeneration.flavor: Lost mana returns in another form
modifier.tprt.mana_regeneration.descript: Per level: Increases mana regeneration by 24%
modifier.tprt.sunlit.description: Per level: Increases critical damage by 20%
modifier.tprt.deep_darkness.description: Per level: Damage increased by 30% while sneaking
modifier.tprt.unreal_image.description: Grants continuous invisibility and periodically grants Resistance II
modifier.tprt.body_like_glass.descriptio: Damage dealt increased to 135%, but damage taken is doubled
modifier.tprt.fragile.flavor: You are more fragile than you think, but your attacks are also sharper
modifier.tprt.fragile.description: Max health reduced by 25%, but attack damage +15%
modifier.tprt.magician.description: Casting cooldown and spell cooldown are improved
modifier.tprt.fountain_magic.description: Increases max mana and mana regeneration speed
modifier.tprt.elemental_mastery.descript: Spells are fully realized in your hands. Per level: Increases Frost, Blaze, Lightning, Nature, and Holy spell power by 10% each
modifier.tprt.endless_life.description: Grants high life regeneration and increases healing effects received
modifier.tprt.gas_poison.flavor: After being burned by this strange ancient crop, you had the idea to use it as a weapon
modifier.tprt.flourishing.description: Walking promotes growth of nearby crops. [Expanded] enhancement greatly increases the range
modifier.tprt.excellent_harvest.descript: Chance to gain extra mature crops and seeds when harvesting certain crops
modifier.tprt.lingering_infusion.flavor: Tea fragrance permeates, refreshing the heart
modifier.tprt.lingering_infusion.descrip: When hit, gain a short Tea Aroma IV effect. If hit while having Tea Aroma, additionally gain a short Resistance III effect
modifier.tprt.flame_rising.description: The power of this Flame Lord grants one upgrade slot and one defense slot
modifier.tprt.the_spirit_of_evil_curse.f: The power of curses reshapes your equipment
modifier.tprt.the_spirit_of_evil_curse.d: The power of this Cursed Undead grants one upgrade slot and one defense slot
modifier.tprt.mechanical_innovation.flav: Forge your equipment with this era-transcending material
modifier.tprt.mechanical_innovation.desc: The masterpiece of ancient engineering grants one upgrade slot and one defense slot
modifier.tprt.the_power_of_beast.flavor: The strange technology of ancient people enhances your equipment
modifier.tprt.the_power_of_beast.descrip: The legacy of the Nether ancients grants one upgrade slot and one defense slot
modifier.tprt.renovation_of_historic_sit: Sealed ancient sites bless your equipment
The remains of ancient ruins grant one upgrade slot and one defense slot
modifier.tprt.storm_potential.flavor: The essence of the storm enchants your equipment
modifier.tprt.storm_potential.descriptio: The hard-to-control storm grants one upgrade slot and one defense slot
modifier.tprt.philosophers_stone.flavor: The crystallization of alchemy reconstructs your equipment
modifier.tprt.philosophers_stone.descrip: The pinnacle work of alchemy grants one upgrade slot, one defense slot, and one ability slot
‚ÄúThen I ask you, why is your head pointy?‚Äù
The dragons roaming the world grant one upgrade slot and one defense slot. Tool attack power +9%
modifier.tprt.ancient_relics.description: Slumbering ancient crops grant two upgrade slots and one ability slot
modifier.tprt.taboo_knowledge.descriptio: Mysterious ancient knowledge grant one upgrade slots
modifier.tprt.solid_armor.flavor: Forge your armor, making it more solid
modifier.tprt.solid_armor.description: Gain one defense slot at the cost of one upgrade slot
modifier.tprt.armor_fragmentation.flavor: Shatter your armor, making it more malleable
modifier.tprt.armor_fragmentation.descri: Gain one upgrade slot at the cost of one defense slot
modifier.tprt.enchantment.flavor: Enchant your item, making its abilities stronger
modifier.tprt.enchantment.description: Gain one ability slot at the cost of two upgrade slots
modifier.tprt.advanced_cheer_up.flavor: Life energy surges within the body
modifier.tprt.advanced_cheer_up.descript: Per level: Increases max health by 5%
modifier.tprt.advanced_cheer_up.requirem: Requires Heart of Life enhancement as prerequisite
modifier.tprt.spell_resist.flavor: 'Your Arts aren't working. How can that be?'
modifier.tprt.spell_resist.description: Per level: Increases Spell Resist by B%
modifier.tprt.advanced_sharpness.flavor: My blade has never been dull
modifier.tprt.advanced_sharpness.descrip: Per level: Increases tool attack power by 10%
modifier.tprt.advanced_power.flavor: Arrows that pierce mountains and shatter rocks
modifier.tprt.advanced_power.description: Per level: Increases projectile power by 10%
modifier.tprt.advanced_power.requirement: Requires Power V enhancement as prerequisite
modifier.tprt.advanced_swiftstrike.descr: Per level: Increases tool melee speed by 10%
modifier.tprt.advanced_swiftstrike.requi: Requires Swift Strike++++ enhancement as prerequisite
modifier.tprt.soul_convergence.descripti: Per level: Increases soul power by 8%
modifier.tprt.dark_condensation.flavor: Inspire deeper dark forces, but this taboo power comes at a price ...
modifier.tprt.dark_condensation.descript: Increases Soul Amplification according to the attack power of tools, but will sacrifice something ...
modifier.tprt.pyrium.description: Strength tools and improve your max mana
modifier.tprt.immolate.description: Get the ability of Infernal Sorcerer Chestplate, and strengthen it
modifier.tprt.gold_spell_book.descriptio: +50 max mana, +15% spell cast time reduction
modifier.tprt.villager_spell_book.descri: +200 max mana, +8% Holy spell power, +8% spell cast time reduction
modifier.tprt.cursed_doll_spell_book.des: +200 max mana, +10% Blood spell power, +10% Spell Resistance
modifier.tprt.the_source_of_all_spells.f: The source of all magic in the world
modifier.tprt.the_source_of_all_spells.d: +1500 max mana, +300 mana regen, +60% total spell power
modifier.tprt.the_source_of_all_spells.r: Requires all 10 types of spellbook enhancements as prerequisite
modifier.tprt.blood_staff.description: +5% spell power, +15% Crimson spell power, +10% summon damage
modifier.tprt.artificer_cane.description: +10% spell power, +15% spell cast time reduction, +15% spell cooldown reduction
modifier.tprt.ice_staff.description: +15% Ice spell power, +5% spell power, +25% mana regeneration
modifier.tprt.lightning_rod.description: +15% Lightning spell power, -15% spell cooldown reduction, +5% spell power
modifier.tprt.pyrium_staff.description: +15% Fire spell power, -15% spell cooldown reduction, +5% spell power
modifier.tprt.strengthen_for_charm_armor: Per level: +3% armor value, +3% armor toughness
modifier.tprt.fortune_curio.flavor: Every day is a lucky day!
modifier.tprt.fortune_curio.description: Enemies drop more loot, and more items drop when mining
modifier.tprt.the_gaze_of_the_cyclops.fl: ‚ÄúDon't you think this big eyeball is a bit creepy?‚Äù ‚Äì Nameless Knight
modifier.tprt.the_gaze_of_the_cyclops.de: Attacks apply Weakness III for a short duration
modifier.tprt.blood_of_hydra.flavor: Gain the Hydra's miraculous self-healing ability
modifier.tprt.fire_dragon_blood.flavor: Refine your dragonbone parts with fire dragon blood.
modifier.tprt.fire_dragon_blood.descript: Slightly increase melee damage. When attacking, it will ignite the target for 5 seconds and greatly repel the target.
modifier.tprt.fire_dragon_blood.requirem: Need dragon bone material as the front.
modifier.tprt.ice_dragon_blood.flavor: Refine your dragonbone parts with ice dragon blood.
modifier.tprt.ice_dragon_blood.descripti: Slightly increase melee damage, greatly weaken the target when attacking.
modifier.tprt.ice_dragon_blood.requireme: Need dragon bone material as the front.
modifier.tprt.lightning_dragon_blood.fla: Refine your dragonbone parts with lightning dragon blood.
modifier.tprt.lightning_dragon_blood.des: Greatly increase melee damage, and will greatly repel the target when attacking.
modifier.tprt.lightning_dragon_blood.req: Need dragon bone material as the front.
modifier.tprt.fear_nothing.flavor: A real man should fear nothing
modifier.tprt.fear_nothing.description: Attack range +1.5 blocks. Increases all types of resistance
modifier.tprt.advanced_luck.description: Enemies drop more loot, and more items drop when mining
modifier.tprt.advanced_melting.descripti: Smelts attacked targets and their drops, but with better effect
modifier.tprt.final_melting.description: Smelts attacked targets and their drops, but with far greater effect than regular smelting!
modifier.tprt.final_melting.requirements: Requires Melting Pot tool as prerequisite
modifier.tprt.tank_expansion.description: Greatly increases the internal tank capacity of the tool
modifier.tprt.tank_expansion.requirement: Requires Tank III enhancement as prerequisite
modifier.tprt.final_tank.description: Massively increases the internal tank capacity of the tool
modifier.tprt.final_tank.requirements: Requires Tank V enhancement as prerequisite
modifier.tprt.bulk_quiver.description: Grants the bow 5 quiver slots. Hold the bow and press 'Attack' to switch slots. Sneak and press 'Attack' to access these slots. Can call Tinker's Arrows
modifier.tprt.bulk_quiver.empty: Practical Quiver: No arrow in slot %s, using normal arrow
modifier.tprt.poisonous_explosion.descri: The attack will cause a small range of magic damage based on the level and duration of the target's current poisoning effect and clear the target's poisoning effect.
modifier.tprt.quenching_poison.descripti: The attack will poison the target, with the highest level of 5. The higher the level, the longer the duration (duration can be superimposed).
modifier.tprt.reaper.flavor: Plunder the enemy's life for your own use
modifier.tprt.reaper.description: Damage dealt increased to 150%. Heals 75% of actual damage dealt
modifier.tprt.persistence_of_nature.flav: We are connected by blood, we never retreat
modifier.tprt.persistence_of_nature.desc: When current health is below 75%, being hit restores 3 + 3% of missing health. Trigger cooldown 0.5 seconds
modifier.tprt.enchanting.description: Attacks deal additional magic damage and it can be improved according to spell power
modifier.tprt.release_spells.flavor: Your sword can be used as staff!
modifier.tprt.release_spells.description: Alloy use tools to release spells
modifier.tprt.lastone.flavor: The final glory of the human warrior!
modifier.tprt.real_attack.description: Directly touches the target's soul, ignoring part of its armor and resistance
modifier.tprt.double_or_none.description: I bet your gun has no bullets!
modifier.tprt.d2_lucky_pants.description: ‚ÄúWhat? No, I don't have illegally modified holsters. These are just super lucky pants!‚Äù ‚Äì Cayde-6
modifier.tprt.d2_half_truths.description: When switching to this weapon, if the next attack misses the target, grants the wielder powerful momentum
